text: Neu chung co đi tham chien thi chung cung chang giup gi them cho cac nguoi, nguoc lai, chung chi lam roi loan hang ngu bang cach lang xang chay qua chay lai giua cac nguoi đe xui giuc ke khac lam loan va trong cac nguoi co mot so tin đo nghe theo chung; nhung Allah biet ro nhung nguoi lam đieu sai quay
